description:
Parham Law Firm, LLC, is a well-established South Carolina practice led by a trial lawyer with 18-plus years of trial experience. Rose Mary Parham focuses much of her practice in federal criminal defense and personal injury. She is a trial lawyer at heart and widely respected for her skills and abilities in the courtroom. Parham Law Firm, LLC, is committed to its clients and reaching a favorable outcome, regardless of the circumstances of the situation.

Unique Perspective In Federal Criminal Law

Mrs. Parham has extensive trial experience and has the skills to undertake nearly all types of misdemeanor and felony offenses, and federal offenses. Her clients value her in-depth knowledge of both the state and federal criminal systems and her proven track record.

An Advocate For The Injured

Rose Mary Parham uses her litigation experience to help negotiate effective settlements for her clients. She is a strong advocate for those who have been injured in car and truck accidents, slip-and-falls, and other types of negligent accidents. She also represents the elderly and disabled individuals who have been injured in nursing home or assisted care facilities.

Contact Parham Law Firm, LLC, at 843-536-0372 or toll free at 888-341-3469 to schedule an appointment with federal criminal defense attorney Rose Mary Parham. Located in Florence, South Carolina, the firm accepts cases throughout the nearby areas.
